analysis.description:
CryptoPornSmartContract.purchase (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#183-227) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#222)

CryptoPornSmartContract._payout (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#367-373) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- cooAddresses[0].transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#368-369)
	- cooAddresses[1].transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#369-371)
	- cooAddresses[2].transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#371-373)
	- cooAddresses[3].transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7287bef78619e10c32a1eee82046fa3c4a29f17d.sol#373)
